taskDescription: Controls notification preferences to avoid overload
Balances manual control over data logging with system functions
Negotiates privacy boundaries between clients and ALFRED
Seeks clear options to customize notifications and data sharing
Manage alerts to avoid being overloaded by continuous health data streams
Select manually which health data to review and when
Configures session settings, including data recording options
Manually chooses what data to record during therapy sessions
Filters and manages notifications to avoid overload
Balances care needs of clients with different privacy preferences
Manage conflicting privacy preferences among different clients
Manually approves urgent notifications for clients with strict privacy settings
Manages alerts and sensor data streams from clients
Manually approves which client data is logged
Manually disables non-critical notifications for clients to prevent burnout
Prefers to manually control clinical action logging
Disables automatic recording features to keep records clear
